name: Personal Protective Equipment (PPE)
summary: PPE is a standalone experience that allows players to assess their knowledge of the personal protective equipment (PPE) required to participate in various key workplaces. Workplaces include a construction site, a science lab, a welding bay, a veterinary x-ray clinic and a commercial kitchen. The PPE selector, at the beginning of experience, can be used to select the specific workplace the player will be assessed on.
